abstract: NBA and players' union negotiators resume their dizzying on-again, off-again talks to end lockout; substantial progress is made, but there is no expectation that a deal will be struck before they adjourn.
snippet: Optimism, a rare visitor in N.B.A. circles in recent months, crept back into the negotiating room on Wednesday.
lead_paragraph: Optimism, a rare visitor in N.B.A. circles in recent months, crept back into the negotiating room on Wednesday.

headline.main: N.B.A. Negotiations Yield a Glimmer of Hope for Full Season
headline.print_headline: N.B.A. Negotiations Yield a Glimmer of Hope for Full Season
